item.title: nodeJS
item.description: nvm setting nvm ls nvm ls available nvm install {version} nvm use {version} npm setting npm config set registry https://registry.npm.taobao.org npm config set sass_binary_site "https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/node-sass" npm config list cnpm settting npm install -g cnpm --registry=https://registry.npm.taobao.org error MSBUILD : error MSB4132: 无法识别工具版本“2.0”。可用的工具版本为 “4
